How about a "Four" series, including Four Fast Guns?  I saw it in 1959? and have been trying to get it for decades. [It is a class double-z western that actually has great dead-pan rips on many western-flic cliches.]
Wow!  46 movies (so far) in two days!?!?!?
Let's seed folks to keep this train rolling. wooohooo!
To cozy8. Sorry. Don't have Hotel Berlin. Never heard of, as a matter of fact.

Pirp-
The hotel is a hotbed of Nazis, refugees, spies and ordinary Germans trying to survive inevitable defeat without getting too involved.
